action.action-desc: Mr. Cook (for himself and Mr. Takano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the calculation of the amount of the monthly housing stipend payable under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs based on the location of the campus where classes are attended.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans’ Education Equity Act.

section.header: Calculation of monthly housing stipend under Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program based on location of campus where classes are attended

subsection.text: Section 3313(c)(1)(B)(i)(I) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking the institution of higher learning at which the individual is enrolled and inserting the campus of the institution of higher learning where the individual physically participates in a majority of classes.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to initial enrollment in a program of education on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
